reviewText: Loved this movie. Love anything Jonathan Rhys Meyers is in. Hes the best actor I know of and can adapt to any part he plays. I had other favorites at one time but I am smitten by him. I watched the movie twice to understand what was going on. A tumultuous relationship only to end in sadness.
DVD does not play at all.
Have watched it over and over.  Great job JRM!!
Not my favorite JRM but still good.
I expected a little more, but it was good.
